sentences.english: She avoids big-ticket clothing items in case they may be counterfeit — as well as anything edible.
sentences.chinese: 她不买高价服装以免碰到假货，还有吃的东西。

sentences.english: Silk Street used to be full of fakes and imitations.
sentences.chinese: 秀水街原来都是假货和仿制品。

sentences.english: This watch may be a counterfeit, but it looks just like the original.
sentences.chinese: 这只手表有可能是假货，但它看起来很像原装货。

sentences.english: As long as they are good fakes, other people won't know any different.
sentences.chinese: 只要假货不露馅，别人也就看不出差别。

sentences.english: Now, most of the herb sold is fake and is made with plastic.
sentences.chinese: 现市面上卖的多为假货，用塑胶假冒的。

sentences.english: Our aimHonesty, genuine, no fakes, created hundred years old.
sentences.chinese: 我们的宗旨诚信，正品，无假货，创建百年老店。

sentences.english: Mr. Ellis, sly old fox, tricked us into buying fake goods.
sentences.chinese: 伊利斯这个狡猾的老狐狸骗我们买了假货。

sentences.english: The rampancy of fake commodities cause the decline of social moral standards.
sentences.chinese: 假货的猖獗降低了社会道德标准。

sentences.english: Wouldn't worry, the bags will be cheap knock-offs.
sentences.chinese: 不用担心，这些包包肯定是廉价的假货。

sentences.english: The visitors were shanghaied into buying fake goods.
sentences.chinese: 游客被诱骗购买了假货。

sentences.english: The antique dealer has an unerring ability to spot a fake.
sentences.chinese: 那古董商慧眼识珠，鉴别假货从不出错。

sentences.english: Many fake the real thing, merchants can not see through at once.
sentences.chinese: 许多假货可以乱真，商家无法一下子识破。

sentences.english: They imposed a false article upon him as genuine.
sentences.chinese: 他们以假货充真货硬塞给他。

sentences.english: They have to buy a fake one for 10,000 toman [$10].
sentences.chinese: 所以他们就买10美元一件的假货。

definition: online purchase of goods dispatched from overseas
to impersonate/to pose as (someone else)/to counterfeit/to palm off (a fake as a genuine)
to counterfeit/to pass off a fake as genuine
lit. if one is fake, I shall compensate you for ten of them/fig. (of goods) 100% genuine
